title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.6 - Affixing of decals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.6 - Affixing of decals

State Regulations

After the consent form has been signed by a registrant and
filed with the participating law enforcement agency which provided the form, a
police officer or designated employee of that participating law enforcement
agency or the registrant shall affix the rectangular Watch Your Car decal to
the front windshield, passenger side of the vehicle, the circular Watch Your

Car decal to the lower left corner of the motor vehicle's rear window, and the
rectangular international decal next to the Night Program front windshield
decal if the registrant has chosen to participate in the international
program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
72.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
